root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 3-a-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The results of the modelling described in the Method of Computation are compared with the input data to assure a good model fit. The results and input data are shared with countries via the tobacco control focal point for country consultation prior to publication in the biennial reports WHO global report on trends in tobacco use 2000-2025 and WHO Report on the Global Tobacco Epidemic. During country consultation, sometimes additional data are made available to WHO by the country for the purposes of modelling indicator 3.a.1.
